0xD2C15D7.name: GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_COLLECTION_TEXTURE_VARIATIONS

params.name: collection
params.description: Name of the collection. Empty string for the base game collection. See [GET_PED_COLLECTION_NAME](#\_0xFED5D83A) in order to list all available collections.

params.name: drawableId
params.description: Local drawable Id inside the given collection. Refer to [GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_COLLECTION_DRAWABLE_VARIATIONS](#\_0x310D0271).

0xD2C15D7.description: An alternative to [GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_TEXTURE_VARIATIONS](#\_0x8F7156A3142A6BAD) that uses local collection indexing instead of the global one.
0xD2C15D7.resultsDescription: Number of texture variations available for the given drawable component. Returns 0 if ped or collection does not exist or index is out of bounds.
